1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
.....a bottle of white and red pills.

He pops open the top and picks out a white pill and hands it to you and says "ok, let us start test #1, take this pill."

Reluctantly, you take the pill out of his hand and ask, "what does it do?"

With a grin he says with 1 hand at his waist the other in front of you, offering you a glass of water, "what is the fun in that, you will know when you take it"

Obviously still nervous, you simply say "ok" and pop the pill into your mouth and swallow it with the water.





What does it do...
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Test #1

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
A minute passes by and nothing, "hmmm, do you feel anything?" he asks. "No, I feel fine" you reply. "...maybe the dosage wasn't strong enough," he mutters to himself.

Suddenly, your stomach starts to feel weird. Alex notices your hand on your stomach and says "hah, its starting to take affect."

Your stomach starts to feel really weird. Now with both hands on your stomach, you notice something, its growing! "Wh-what's happening to me"? you say startled.

He simply looks at you and says" that white pill you took, is a new inflation pill that I invented."

"Inflation?! is my stomach going to continue to grow!?" you ask nervously. "It shouldn't" he replied "What do you mean by shouldn't you say worried. "It should stop after a while, though

that is why we are testing it."

You wanted to argue more, but the sensation of your stomach blowing up stops you, it feels so good, now the size of a basket ball, your shirt can no longer hold your stomach. You

inflate a little more when...
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Uneasy feeling in your stomach.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
The sensation in your stomach stops, followed by your stomach's inflation to stop, leaving it slightly bigger than a beach ball. Relieved, you wonder what he wants next.

The whole time, he had been observing and writing down notes, noticing it stopped, he walks over to you, lifts up your shirt and starts examining your bloated stomach.

Surprised by what he's done, and by how good it feels, you just stand there and let him examine your stomach.

He finishes, stands back up, looks at you and says " so far, so good, we can do something else, or continue with this, I would like to see how far this will go", he says holding out his

hands, in one the red pill, in the other the white pill.

"As you already know, the white pill inflates, the red pill, however, deflates, it will turn you back to normal".
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: It stopped.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
Since being inflated felt so good, and of course he will probably pay more for a longer experiment, you decide to take another white pill.

You take the white pill out of his hand and pop it into your mouth and swallow.

Another minute passes and that sensation in your stomach comes back.

Your stomach starts expanding once again....
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Continuing the experiment.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
Your stomach expands a little more, than unexpectedly stops. "Hmmm, is that as much as it will go?" Alex says, as he stops taking notes, noticing that the inflation had stopped.

"How do you feel," he asks you. "I feel fine, the sensation in my stomach is gone and...oh" you stop saying with a weird look on your face. "What's wrong" he asks.

You want to say, but can't, the sensation is now in your arms and legs. Suddenly, you realize your arms are rising to your head without you making them.

You look over to your arms and notice that they are beginning to expand now too. Surprised, you look over to Alex, whose just as surprised. "This is unexpected, I did not think your arms and legs would expand too" he says, delighted, as he goes back to taking notes.

Wait legs? you say to yourself as you look down and notice your legs expanding too.
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Not just your gut.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
As your arms and legs continuously expand, your stomach begins again, though its much slower.

Right now, you can't say a word, it just feels too good.

Though just a minute later you notice something...odd....your arms and legs are expanding, but not getting bigger,

With a look of shock, you realize whats happening, they are combining with your body.

Just as you realize this, your head begins to expand and merge too.

As your head expands and merges with your body, you manage to look at Alex, and hes grinning, he is obviously surprised and is having a blast watching what his pill is capable of.

A few minutes pass, and you are a perfectly spherical ball, you can see your arms, legs and head, and you can still see and hear, its just that you are now a ball.
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Spherical.

choices: Stay like this, for a while.
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
Though you are not to happy that you are basically a ball...you can't help but admit to yourself just how good the whole thing felt.

Alex finishes writing, places his pen and writing board down and walks over to you.

"Well I must say, THAT was quite unexpected, though it was quite fun to watch, and, I bet even better to be the one undergoing it," he says as he looks down at you, with his hands on his hips laughing.

For some reason, you are still able to talk. "Yeah very funny, can you change me back now?".

He stops laughing and looks down at you with a surprised look, "oh? you can still talk, this just keeps getting better and better," he says as he bends down and lifts you up.

"Wha- what are you doing, put me down" you say, surprised and embarassed.

He puts the face part of the ball to his face and says,"ok, I should be able to change you back, since you still have a mouth, or....you could stay like this, for a while anyway, so, what will it be.........
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: A ball's choice.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
"Very well," he says, as he opens your mouth and puts in 2 red pills.

A minute later and you start to hear a hissing sound, and you start to deflate.

Your arms, legs, head, everything starts to separate itself from your body as it starts shrinking back to normal size.

A couple of minutes pass, and you are finally back to normal.

"Good, the red pills work too," he says with a satisfied look on his face, "now for your payment". 1500 DOLLARS SENT TO ACCOUNT 4000 TOTAL.

"Ah, only 1000 more huh, good, one more experiment should cover it.....or you could take a breather from it, huh?, what do you say?"
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Deflate.

Your close, only one more experiment should do it, according to him."I'll continue," you say with a serious look on your face.

"Excellent, great attitude, HAH, so, do you want me to choose again, or do you want to pick it out yourself."
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Which one.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
Before you could see what was in his hands, an alarm goes off.

Alex quickly runs over to one of his consoles to see what was going on.

"Hey, what does that sound mean?" you ask. "It means that something is wrong somewhere in my lab," he says typing away to see what was the matter.

"Come, follow me," he says as he starts heading to one of the doors. "Wait, where are we going?" you say as you follow. "No time to explain right now," he says.

As you follow him, the door slides open and you both enter it, however, just before you go through, you manage to read what was on top of the door.

Monster Area.....
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Alarm.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
Your following him down a large corridor with large locked doors on both sides, there are areas in front of each door that have computers and stuff like that.

You notice he stops and you see why, on one of the large metal doors, there is a gigantic hole, like something had forced itself out from the inside.

Before you can even ask, Alex turns around and starts talking.

"All the doors that you saw contained various monster species that I was studying, heh, it looks like one escaped..."

"Wait, what do you mean escaped?! you mean that there is a monster running around here somewhere?!'

"That's exactly what I am saying, and since we did not see it on the way here, it must have gone further in," with this he starts thinking, after a while he finally starts talking again,"ok, I need you to stay here, while I go and look for it," as he finishes, he goes over to the wall and opens a secret compartment containing a large trapper and some other weapons. 'This shouldn't take too long" he says as he darts off further down the hall, leaving you all alone........
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Escapee.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
As you are waiting for Alex to come back, you decide to sit down at the station that you guess was monitoring the monster it that room.

Some time passes and you can't help but help but feel the sensation that something is watching you...
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Being watched.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
As you sit there, bye yourself, your starting to get really nervous. That feeling of someone watching you is getting worse, like there are more than 2 eyes staring at you.

Suddenly, you feel a sharp, small pain in your back, you try to turn around to see what happened, but, you pass out, unable to see what bit you.

You finally wake up, you look at your surroundings, only to see a forest that was similar to the one you had been in before, upon looking closer, you notice that there are walls and a ceiling, and on one of the walls is the hole that was through the door, only this time, you are inside it.

Trying to get up, you realize something, you can't move! Struggle as you want, you are only able to slightly move your head.

You hear something.

You look to your left and see.......
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: In the hole.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
You see a massive monster that sort of resembles a beetle. It is about the size of your head, and is red with black stripes.

Unfortunately, you also notice something else. There are a LOT of them, including a few blue and even less green versions of the same bug. You assume it was a green one that stung you, since its the only type that had a stinger at the end of it.

Wide eyed, you start to panick, you would shout, but you can't speak. Helpless, you watch as a couple of blue ones walk to you, and some fly from the trees over to you.

You watch as 1 positions itself by your head, 2 by your hands, and 2 by your feet. They open their mouths, and start spraying this bluish green substance onto you.

Now covered in there slime, you wander what they were doing, you notice what resembled steam coming off of you, its that goo on you, its melting your clothes!

Watching helplessly, you watch as your shirt and pants dissolve, followed by your bra and panties, till you are lying there naked.

What next.
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Surrounded.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
As the blue ones walk/fly off, the red ones start coming/flying towards you, taking there place.

As you sit there, you start to wander to yourself, the green ones can paralyze, the blue ones can melt, maybe that is how they made that hole, what do the red ones do.

Suddenly, it hits you, and you do not like it, this reminds you of what happened in the woods with that plant monster, and how this planet is for pleasure. You are pretty sure that they are going to basically rape you, just like the plant did.

Your fears are realized when 2 red beetles spread your legs, each holding one, then let go, allowing a third to clime on top of you, you watch as it slightly lifts itself up, allowing its beetle part to come out and dangle just over your opening.
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: What do the red ones do?

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
The red beetle's part starts probing your area, then, with one swift movement, penetrates you. With a quick sound of surprise, the beetle starts pumping back and forth.

You can only watch as it forces you to have sex with it.

Suddenly, a strange, but familiar sensation hits your area, it is the beetle, its putting its egg into you.

"Not again" is all you can think as you once again recall the plant monster doing the same.

One egg after another enters you as the beetle continues to pump back and forth.

It finishes up and pulls out of you, "it's finally over" you think to yourself, however, it isn't you feel something enter your vagina, it was another red beetle!

This goes on for a long time, as beetle after beetle mount you and lays its eggs in you.

You could only endure so much, after over a dozen finish with you, you finally pass out.....






After some time passes you finally wake up and see.....
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Reds do the work.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
You finally wake up to see the back of Alex in front of you, your still on the floor.

You look around and see that all the beetles are dead, there was obviously a fight.

Alex turns around to you and you notice that his clothes are torn and he has some cuts on him.

He walks over to you and bends down, pulling something out of his pocket. He lifts your arm up and he injects something into you. "That was the antidote" he says, "you should be able to get up now"

You try to stand up, its a little bit hard, but your able to. You then thank him as he looks around at all the dead beetles.

"Such a waste, they were some good test subjects too, oh well," he says looking at you pointing a finger at your swollen stomach, "there's plenty more where they came from" he says as he starts laughing. He then tells you to follow him as the 2 of you leave the monster area and head back into the main lab area.

"Just wait here a second" he says as he leaves and comes back with a rolling metal table. Your having flashbacks to what happened all over again.

He wheels the table over to you and opens his mouth, but you interrupt him.

"Let me guess, lay down on the table so you can pump my stomach and get these eggs out of me." "Exactly right," he says a bit surprised, "I guess you would know since this is the second time you will be going through this". You lay down on the table as Alex goes and gets a similar looking device and inserts it into you and turns it on. Having to go through the same thing twice, you wait for it to finish, "at least it feels good", you say to yourself.

The machine finishes and Alex hands you some jeans and a shirt. You put them on and Alex starts talking. "I guess its time for your payment," he says. You look up at him curiously and ask, "why? I though you were just wanted to catch the monster that escaped", "true,true", he says, "but I have cameras in all of the pens I have down there," he says with a grin, "I've got the whole thing recorded between you and those monsters, from them paralyzing you and dragging you into there to them melting your clothes to beyond you passing out, it is good information, and to top it all off," he says patting the eggs in the pump, I have some new specimens, so the least I can do is pay you," as he finishes, the bank voice appears again. 1000 DOLLARS ADDED TO ACCOUNT 5000 TOTAL.

Alex, still grinning, looks at you and says, "and that's 5000 I told you that I would get you enough to bring him here, now go, unless you feel like staying a little longer."

You just stand there, staring, you finally got it, after everything that has happened, you finally have 5000, enough to bring him here, though, there is no hurry to get him.....
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Saved.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
You can't help but get excited, with a pure smile on your face, you get up and say that your going to leave.

"Well alright," Alex says as he pulls out that teleporter again and pushes the button.

As you are surrounded in those blue lights again Alex starts talking, "If you ever need cash, I always need assistants" he says with both hands on his hips laughing as you dissappear.

You reappear back at your apartment, you quickly run inside and clean yourself up, after about an hour you leave your apartment, lock it and dash in the direction of the main office....
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Cleaning up.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
You make it to the main office and run inside. Once inside, you see a familiar face, it was Lissara, who was surprised by your bursting in, "Well, well, Elizabeth, this is a surprise, what can I do for you?" she says with a smile. You walk over to her, out of breath, and say, "its true that I can bring someone here if I have enough, right?"

Surprised by this, she replies, "of course, though I am surprised you know of this, it is currently 5000 to bring someone here, is there someone you would like to be here?"

Blushing, you say," y-yes, I just finished getting 5000, I would like to bring my boyfriend here," still smiling she replies,"of course just give me his name and well see if he wants to come, we cannot bring someone unless they have some sort of desire to come here in the first place, that is how this machine was built. You tell him his name, "its Jason", "Jason it is," she says as she starts typing away at her computer. She looks up at you and says," is this him," pointing over to where you first appeared. The floor became transparent, and you are looking down on Jason, "yes it is" you say.

Does he miss you?
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: See through floor.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
You see him walking down a street of your old town, he suddenly stops, its at a coffee shop that you too use to go to a lot. He takes out his wallet and looks at a picture of you. That settles it, he misses you.

Lissara then starts talking to you again, "Ok, thats good, he misses you and he has a desire to come here, just let me get the 5000 and he will be brough here."

The bank voice again, 5000 TAKEN OUT AND PAIN 0 DOLLARS TOTAL LEFT IN ACCOUNT.

"Ok, everythings good to go," she says as she starts typing away again. You notice in the transparent floor that multicolored light started to surround him, "What the hell!?" was all Jason could say as he vanished in front of the shocked people that were around him.

A bright flash, and you are suddenly staring Jason in the face. Stunned, he says, "E-Elizabeth!?" "yes,its me" you manage to say embracing him, "but how, you vanished everyone had given up looking for you?"

Lissara then brings over 3 chairs, looking at his face, you cant help but laugh when he noticed that lissara was a lizard girl. Motioning for both of you to sit, you and Lissara explain to him where he is and everything that has happened since you first arrived here..........
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Jason.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
Lissara smiles and waves as you and Jason leave the main office on the way back to both of yours and his apartment.

"I still can't believe this is happening," Jason says, "I know, I couldn't believe it at firs either" you reply.

"So you already told me everything that happened here, how is this place, what do you think of it,"

You stop, you hadn't really given this much thought. You finally look at him and say, "I actually really like it here, nothing really hurts, and it's a lot of fun," you say embarassed.

"If you say so, then it must be, you'll have to show me around in a bit,"

After walking and talking for a while, you both arrive at your apartment, you turn around and say, "well, were home," with a smile.

You unlock it and both of you enter, its pretty late, so you both decide to go to bed right now, he gets in first, you watch him and decide on something, you go over to the same bed and get in.

"What are you doing Elizabeth?" he says surprised. You mearly look at him with a upset look on your face, "I have done it with a plant and bugs, I want to choose for once," you say kissing him.

You both enjoy a pleasurable night together and life on Paradise/Fetish planet.
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: Together.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
"My name is Sherry, I would like your help, Elizabeth". She has blond hair and blue eyes and she is dressed in a white lab coat. "Wait, how do you know my name?" you ask, "Of course I know you, even though you are new, there is already word of you taking down that creature, and that is why I am here, if you haven't already figured out by my clothing, I am a scientist, though I am not some ordinary one, I am responsible for a major part in the development and research of existing and new devices that are both technical and magical in nature". "And what do yo want from me" you ask her. With a grin on her face, she says "I know you want to bring someone here". Surprised, you respond, "h-how did you know?" "I already told you, I am a top scientist, this is something I can easily find out, if you help me...I will personally pay to bring HIM here," she says, still grinning, thinking that you will easily agree.

Your stunned, your eyes are wide open and your shaking, here is your chance, you can take her offer and bring him over when your done with whatever it is that she wants. However, she knows a lot, only one person knows that you want to bring someone here, so, how does she? You try talking, but words do not come out.

"You don't have to say a thing," she says "I already know what you're going to ask me, but let me say this first, since this is Paradise Planet, and we have those devices that were bonded to our bodies upon arrival, you will be completely safe, all I want, is for you to help me with some of my experiments, since you seem to be pretty tough, that is why I am here with this offer, I just want you to help me for a few days and be tested on or test some of my creations, I know this is a lot to ask, but, I think you'd be more than willing...considering the reward I am offering...so, what do you say...." she says, still grinning, and with a few laughs.

So, will you accept?
1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.title: In the name of progress.

1111111111112121112111211222111111121111.content:
You think for a few minutes and answer, "yes, I will help you". "Excellent," she says, "now, I will pay you 1000 dollars per experiment". Just then, the voice returns, JOB ACCEPTED, PAID 1000 PER COMPLETED TASK". "Good, let's go, shall we," she says motioning you to follow. "Wait, right now?" you ask. "Of course, you just accepted and now we head to my lab, I have a lot to test". "Fine, can you give me a second to get ready?" "Very well," she agrees as you get ready.

Zaffier chuckled nervously. "I'll admit that I get swarmed by those things, every now and then. But, then again, everyone gets swarmed by them. Ask about the T-Rex, and everyone will tell you about how either they killed it, or it killed them. Ask about the Compies though, and everyone goes dead silent, and while newbies may laugh at first, they too become quiet about them."

"Useful to know," you said. You then looked at the stove. "What's for breakfast?"

"Sausage, ham, bacon, home-fries, pancakes, milk, cereal, and fruit," said Zaffier. "I like to have a balanced meal."

"Sounds good," came Howard's voice, from behind you. "Just the thing for after Dessert."

You turned, and found the wolfman standing at the doorway to the kitchen.

"_____," he said. "After breakfast, I've got to introduce you to some buddies of mine at the Vore House. You'd be quite popular there."

"What about sexually?" you asked.

"You were good, but not enough to make a real living at it, like I am," said Howard. "Casual sex, you'd do good, but the really fancy stuff, that isn't you. Between friends and those who are lonely, or just need a quick fix like I did, that's more your speed. But there's some intricate forms that are the big money stuff, and you don't quite have that."

"So, how good do you think she'd do at the Vore House?" Zaffier asked, as he got some plates out, and put them on the table.

"Given how well she tastes, and depending on those with deep pockets who want to do more than just swallow her, ten thousand on the slow nights, a hundred thousand on a good night, and at least a million on a busy night."

"Why are you talking like I'd need a job?" you asked.

"Well, if your not interested in being eaten all the time, I'm sure you'll find something more your speed," said Zaffier. "Still, Howard knows the people that run the place, and they always have a spot open for those who want to make some quick cash. That, and knowing the right people never hurts."

"So, just how would I apply for a job there?" you asked.

"Draco would try you himself," said Howard. "That dragon always tries the perspective Vore House himself. If he doesn't like the way you taste, well, you're not going on the menu there at any rate. If he does like you, he'll put you through a trial run over the next twenty-four hours, with you being the featured meal, or at least one of them. Depending on how well you do, and whether or not he has an opening, you could get yourself a full-time job, a part-time job, as needed, or if there isn't a spot open, he may call on you in the future if a spot does open up. That being said, there's always a spot open for those who need to make some quick cash."

"That's good to know," you said. "By the way, since I have the five thousand dollars I need, could you guys take me to the Main Building after breakfast, so that I can bring my boyfriend here?"

Zaffier looked at Howard and grinned. "It would be our pleasure to see who it is that will have the company of such a lovely meal as yourself."

You chuckled at this. Barely 24 hours here, and already you're getting used to things. "Thanks."

A while later, you and your new friends were at the Main Building, and you were talking to Lissara about your boyfriend, and how you wanted to bring him to this place.

She smiled at this. "Your account number?"

You tell her.

She then punched some keys into a computer. "$5100. Hmm, usually takes a few days to get that much."

"She had a little help there," said Zaffier.

"I can tell," Lissara said, as she looked at your two friends. "She taste good?"

"I'm going to recommend her to Draco after this," said Howard. "That should tell you how good she tastes."

"That dragon only accepts the best at his place," said Lissara. "I'll have to try her myself." She then looked at you. "Before we bring your boyfriend here, would you like to see what's going on?"

"Sure," you said.

At this, Lissara pressed a few buttons, and a monitor showed up, showing that your boyfriend was.....
111111111111212222212212211111221213.title: Suggestions on a job

1111111111112122222122122111112212133.content:
You gasped in shock, and disbelief at what you were seeing. There was your boyfriend, having sex with another woman. Then, anger, and jealousy came in, as you recognized the woman; it was your best friend! You'd shared everything together; clothes, test answers, secrets, dreams, everything, including how you wished that you and your boyfriend could finally have sex, but you were waiting for something special.

And now, there she was, with him!

"Not even 24 hours, and that son of a bitch is sleeping with my best friend!" you yelled. "And how dare she have sex with my boyfriend! I'm going to-"

At this, Zaffier grabbed a hold of you, and dragged you over to the other side of the building. "You can't do anything to them!" he hissed. "To them, you're dead! Get that through your head. They think that you died of some rare heart defect, or some such thing! To them, the living keep living."

"Still, they could of waited like six months," you said. "I doubt I'm even in the ground over there, or whatever substitute you've put in my place at any rate."

"And think about this," said Zaffier. "Maybe both of them missed you so badly, they connected. Maybe, this is just something they are doing to get rid of their pent up sorrow."

"You mean, like pity sex?" you asked. "I've heard about that, but I only thought that it was something made up by those who couldn't get their own boyfriend or girlfriend."

"Let's hope it's something along those lines," said Zaffier. "Who knows, might be able to cut a deal to bring both of them here."

You nod at this. You were willing to forgive them if it was grief that made them act like they were. Of course if they were cheating behind your back..... well, $5000 saved, Was, $5000 earned.

You walked back with Zaffier, and saw that Howard was still standing by the monitor, watching.

"He's doing a good job," the wolf said. "Nothing like me, but I see potential."

"Howard, shut up about how good you are for a little bit," said Zaffier. "Lissara, turn on the audio. Need to find out something."

The female lizard nodded, and pressed a switch, and soon you could hear the pair speaking.
1111111111112122222122122111112212133.title: Having sex with another woman, Your Best Friend!

choices: Ah, what the hell. I forgot to pack my lunch anyways. Count me in.
However, the rules forbid me from doing such things.
Perhaps you should take her to Draco's instead. I don't want trouble.
11111111111121222221221221111122121331.content:
As you listened to what was being said, tears rolled down your face.

"____ always told me about how she could have sex with you," you heard your best friend said. "It's a shame she'll never be able to."

"I wish I had done it with her," you heard your boyfriend said. "She said that she wanted to wait until we got married. I was willing to wait until then. But now-" You then heard him start to cry.

Zaffier glanced at you, looked at Lissara, and nodded. The sound cut out.

"They miss me," you sobbed out. You then looked at Zaffier. "Can we bring both of them?"

Zaffier looked at Lissara. "Any specials going on?"

"Like a 2-for-1 deal, sorry," said Lissara. "$5000 each."

You looked at Zaffier. "Can you help me out?"

Zaffier looked at Lissara again. "Can I buy her friend's ticket?"

Lissara shook her head. "I'm sorry. She has to purchase it with her own money. Otherwise everyone would be purchasing everyones' friends."

"I see," said Zaffier. Then, the lizard grinned. "Of course, if I made a business deal with her, then it would be her money, now wouldn't it."

Lissara raised an eyebrow. "Yes, but you can't just give her the full five thousand. And you can't just give her half, and have your buddy her give her the other half."

Zaffier nodded. "Right." He then looked at you. "Sex and a Meal, next week. Two thousand dollars."

You blinked at this. "You're paying me now, to be next week's big meal for you?"

Zaffier grinned. "Like I said, it will take me that long until I need another big meal. Saves me searching for it."

You smiled at this. In his own way, the lizard was offering you his help. "Of course."

Zaffier looked at Howard. "What about you? Would you like to have her once more?"

The wolf got out a book, flipped through it. "Sex and a meal, next week. Two thousand dollars."

You nodded at this.

Zaffier then looked at Lissara. "What about you? You could use something for lunch. She's very tasty."

Lissara chuckled at this. "I see what you're doing......
11111111111121222221221221111122121331.title: It was Pity Sex

111111111111212222212212211111221213313.content:
"However, if I was to make a purchase of, anything involving her, sex, meal, or anything else, I could get into trouble," said Lissara. "I would love to hang the rule up, but I, personally, can not help her out. None of us who operate the machine can do that. Favoritism and all that."

You hung your head in disbelief.

"Of course, if you came up with some Quick Cash within a few hours, I would be able to bring both of them here," said Lissara. "You're practically guaranteed a thousand dollars if you take a Quick Cash job at the Vore House. Draco has to give you at least that much, for trying you out himself."

You lifted your head up at this. To get eaten, just to bring your friend over, well, you'd already accepted that part anyways. "Alright," you said. "I'll be back."

Lissara grinned. "I wish you luck. I like bringing people here."

Howard and Zaffier put their arms on your shoulders.

"Then let's see that old firebreather," said Howard.

You chuckled, and gave both of them a quick kiss. "An advance, on next week."

"Yeah, well a word of advise," said Howard. "Draco will give you a few choices when you meet up with him. One is just to go to Quick Cash - you're served how the client wants, and you don't have any choices in the matter. Second, let Draco try you out then and there - Draco pays you for that, and if he likes you, he'll put you through the trial time of 24 hours, though you might be able to convince him to delay it until after we get your friends here. Third, take the Tour - while part of the employees are served to clients as they are, others are prepared in other ways."

"Like what?" you asked.

"Covered in chocolate, pressed into soft caramel, or taffy, stuffed with jelly, cream, or pudding, or shrunken with stuff done to them," said Howard. "Others are altered to taste like other things, like chicken or pork, or apples, or some such thing."

"It's like going on a tour of a bakery and candy company," said Zaffier. "They even offer Free Samples."

"Am I supposed to try those?" you asked.

"If you want to," said Howard. "As for the Vore House itself, most of the clients would ask you if they could eat you. Others however, prefer to ambush their meal, and pick you out ahead of time, and while you get told you've been picked, you're not told by who. You could get snagged by a spider on the ceiling, get caught by a frog's tongue, or get pounced. Oh, and you're naked the whole time."

"I see," you said.

Eventually, you get to the Vore House, where you, and your new friends, meet Draco, a large male red dragon.

The large reptile licked his lips, as he looked at you. "So, what do you want? Quick Cash Spot, an Interview with me, or a Tour?"
111111111111212222212212211111221213313.title: Try Draco's

1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
You looked around, and from what you could see, aside from shrunken people being on plates, the place, so far, looked like a regular restaurant. Sometimes a plate would be set at a table, and the occupants of said table would eat those on the plate. Occasionally, a customer would talk to a waiter, who would pass their plate to another, and then the customer would eat the waiter they'd talked to. It was as if things were being done in a rather polite manner, in that there wasn't a whole lot of noise, except for the occasional moan of pleasure from someone who was either enjoying their meal, or was being licked in certain places, but even then that was rather quiet.

In fact, the only noise that really attracted your attention, was when some young woman, who found her self being lifted into the air by some sort of silky thread, started screaming, and flailing her arms. You watched in a bit of horror as she ascended up to a dark part of the ceiling, before she was finally silenced, though you could still hear some sort of muffled sounds.

"Either she doesn't like heights, the dark, or spiders," said Draco, who had watched what was going on, with a slight manner of annoyance. "Still, that's the chance you take in Quick Cash."

"Um, do customers have sex with their meals before they eat them?" you asked.

"Not in my place," said Draco. "Some of the other places that deal in Vore allow that, but here, we focus on the dining aspect, and try to keep things civilized. A person's tongue may wander into certain places during the meal, and perhaps sex would enhance certain aspects, but if I catch a client having sex with one of my employees, especially without permission, said client takes a trip to my stomach."

"In that case, could we have a Tour before we do the Interview?" you asked.

Sure," said Draco. "I'm sure your friends will enjoy it as well. We always have Free Samples."

You looked at Zaffier and Howard, who had large grins on their faces.

"I hope you don't feed them too many," you said. "Both of them had a good sized meal recently."

"I see," said Draco, as he looked at your friends. "She any good?"

Your friends nodded.

"Wouldn't have brought her here if she wasn't good," said Howard.

"I'll be the judge of that," said Draco. "Now, follow me. We do have a few sections here. Got any preferences? Candy Section, Pastry Section, or Meat Section? We can always check out the others after those."
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: Tour of the Vore House

1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
"I guess we could start with the Candy," you said.

"Good," said Draco. "Follow me." He then walked through a set of doors, and your friends, basically, pushed you along.

"I've been wanting to go on a tour of this place," said Zaffier. "Always been busy though."

"What about you?" you asked Howard.

The werewolf chuckled. "I work here part time."

"Really?" you asked.

"There is a small group that likes the taste of werewolves," said Howard. "That and they've got machines to alter your body, both in terms of species and gender, and other traits."

"Like what?"

"Like making humans be capable of swallowing other humans, while they are here," said Howard.

Within moments of passing through the doors, you and the others found yourselves next to what seemed to be a large pool, though it felt like a sauna. In this pool was a lot of people, at least a hundred of them.

"This is but one of twenty of our Cleaning Pools," said Draco. "The first step we have in this place, after you take your clothes off in the Changing Room of course, is to take a bath, to clean you of any foreign debris. Our baths are such that the clients will only taste the real you, and not those of your bathmates."

The dragon resumed walking, and you followed after him.

"Once you are clean, you go to whatever section you've selected to go to, or, in the case of a Quick Cash or a Trial Period Employee, are told to go to. In this case, the Candy Section."

You followed him through another door, and you saw human woman after human woman after human woman, all laying on conveyor belts.

"We are an Equal Opportunity Employer here at this place, though it seems that the human female is a rather popular selection," said Draco. "Here's where things tend to split up. Some stay at their normal size, and make for a good-sized meal, depending on the predator. Others are shrunk down to snack size, to make for easier eating, especially for those who are not used to swallowing a full-sized woman."

"What happens after that?" you asked.

"Your choice," said Draco. "Do you want to follow the Chocolate line, the Soft-Candy line, or the Hard Candy line? We can check out the other lines afterwards."
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: Candy Section

choices: You politely turn down the offer
You try one - and like it
You try one - but don't like it.
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
"Let's go down the Chocolate section," you said.

"Good choice," said Draco, as he walked towards another door, and went through.

You followed after him, and saw a number of lines, where you saw the women enter various machines. When the woman came out of some of the machines, some were covered in chocolate, of one form or another, others were shrunken, and covered with chocolate. Some would enter another machine, and exit in some sort of crazy yoga pose, like a pretzel.

Others, who were not yet covered in chocolate, would enter a machine, and exit looking like they'd gained a bit of weight, or had suddenly become nine months pregnant, or something in between, before they to were covered in chocolate, or shrunken and covered in chocolate.

"Um, what happened to those people?" you asked.

Draco chuckled. "You ever eat a chocolate covered cherry, or a chocolate square with caramel in it, or some sort of filling?"

"Yes," you said.

"Same basic principle," said Draco. "Trick's getting the filling inside without causing an issue."

"How?" you asked.

Draco chuckled. "Human females have three very convenient openings, if you get my drift, and we have hoses with special nozzle to fill those cavities."

You blushed at this.

Then, a young woman came up to you and your friends, holding a plate full of shrunken chocolate-covered women. "Free Samples."

You took a look, and watched as Zaffier and Howard grabbed some, and gobbled them down.

"What about you?" she asked.
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: Chocolate Line

choices: looked at you, and asked if you want to continue with the Tour.
looked at you, and asked if you want to skip to the Interview.
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
"Thank you, but no thank you," you said. "I mean, I only just arrived yesterday, and, well, I'm just not used to the idea of eating people."

"Oh, I understand," the woman said. "Took me a little while myself. Still, more treats for your friends." She then handed the plate to your friends, and started walking away.

However, as she passed Draco, the dragon grabbed her with his jaws, and proceeded to gulp her down. Then, you saw his eyes water, and then belch out a three foot long flame. "Habanero!" he gasped out. "She had her flavor switched to one of those hot peppers! Talk about a good trick to pull on your boss when you know he likes the way you taste. I'll have to give her a bonus for that one!" He then grabbed a fifty-gallon drum of milk, and guzzled it down. "Damn! My throat's still on fire!" He grabbed another drum of milk, guzzled it down, and then another, and still another. Then he breathed a sigh of relief. "That should drown that fire."

You noticed Howard nudging Zaffier, with a grin on his face. "Let's hope so, boss. Don't need you burning down the place, especially with one from the back end."

Draco glared at Howard and ....
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: You politely turn down the offer

1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
"Be lucky you're not on the clock yet," Draco growled. He then calmed himself, and looked at you. "Would you like to continue the tour, Miss?"

"Sure," you said.

"Very well."

You soon followed Draco, and watched what happened all over the place -

You watched shrunken women being covered by, relatively, cooled, yet malleable, boiled sugar, like some novelty hard candies did with certain insect larva.

You watched them being inserted into taffy pieces.

You watched them become something like a caramel apple.

You watched them become something like a jawbreaker.

You watched them become the filling for certain doughnuts.

You watched them get added to ice cream.

You watched them become part of cakes.

You watched them -

Heck, name a food, and you watched them become part of it, in one manner or another.

You looked at Draco. "Um, at any point during this stuff, do these women die?"

The dragon chuckled. "At some point, they do tend to have their mind transferred, if that's what you mean. Usually they do it when they are finished being made into whatever food product they were being made into. That way they can be made into more food products. Others go for the full trip, into the stomach that is."

"Okay," you said.

Soon, the Tour was over, and once again, Draco was looking you over, as Howard and Zaffier went out into the main section of the Vore House, to eat some more shrunken women, not that they hadn't eaten like three dozen or more already.

"So tell me," the dragon said. "Do you want me to conduct the Interview right here and now, in the Tour Walkway? Or we could do it in the Restaurant part, where you'd end up being served anyways? Or would you prefer in the privacy of my office?"
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: Continue

choices: The Interview Question are fairly basic, more or less
The Interview Questions are somewhat Difficult
The Interview Questions are rather Interesting
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
"How about your office?" you suggested.

"Good choice," said Draco. "You don't have so many eyes on you as you would in the Restaurant, and it's more comfortable than right here. Come with me."

You followed the dragon into a room, which had a desk, and a rather large bed.

"I thought that dragons slept on gold," you said.

"Not practical in this day and age," Draco said. "After all, why sleep on it when you can use a bank to protect it for you instead?"

"You mean, dragons slept on gold to keep it safe from thieves?" you asked.

"Don't some humans hide their money in their mattresses still?" Draco asked.

"Well, yes, but a bank is more practical," you said.

"See," said Draco. "Granted, no one is going to try robbing a dragon, unless they wish to be extra crispy, but when your pile of gold and precious gems becomes bigger than you are, it's time to invest in better protective measures."

"I guess that makes sense," you said.

"Also, sleeping on gold and stones is murder on the back, and a wreck when it comes to having a sex life," said Draco. "Tried it once, and my partner told me to stop before I could do anything. A good quality mattress on the other hand, it allows me to be on top, and go all the way, from start to finish. Helps out when digesting a good meal, to say nothing about getting some sleep."

"Alright."

Draco then got on the bed, and looked at you. "So, why do you want the job?"

You looked at the dragon. "Um, aren't you going to eat me?"

"Once I'm done with the interview, I will," said Draco. "Got to shrink you and eat you a few dozen times, having you in our best selling offers to see how you'd fit in. I just find that asking the questions first makes things easier, and sharpens the appetite."

"Okay," you said. "I guess I'm ready."

Draco grinned. "Good."
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: The Office

choices: Your friends Appear, and they're happy to see you
Your friends are not happy to see you
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.content:
"So, let's start off with why you'd like the job?" Draco asked.

"Well, truth be told, there's some friends I'd like to bring here, and it will cost me ten thousand to do so," you said. "I already have five thousand saved up, and Zaffier and Howard each have promised me another two thousand for future favors." You blush at the promise you had made. "I just need another thousand to bring my one other friend here, and I was told that it was easy to make money here."

"I see," said Draco. "By the time you're done here, when I'm done enjoying you, you'll just have one question - How do I spend my money?"

"What do you mean?" you asked.

"By the time I'm done with you, you'll have the equivalent of over a hundred thousand dollars."

Your eyes bulged. "Hundred thousand dollars?"

"Closer to three hundred thousand dollars," said Draco. "You get paid extra for the various fixings and such. It's like charging an extra dollar for an egg added to a burger that costs two dollars already, to say nothing about the bacon, the sausage, the ham, and everything else. All those extras add up after all."

"So, the stuffing the girls with cherry filling, making them part of hard candy, and adding them to ice cream, it's all to increase the price?" you asked.

Draco nodded. "That's the general idea."

"I'm surprised that people can afford the prices," you said.

"It's easy to make money," said Draco. "This is just one of the simpler ways to do it."

"So, how do people make money?" you asked.

"If you mean make money for regular bread, meat, and potatoes sort of things, most any job will take care of basic needs, along with basic fetishes," said Draco. "Of course, when you have more expensive desires, it helps to have a high paying job, and being party to other people's fetishes. Why, you'd be surprised at the number of young women who want to be abducted by a dragon and either be ravished or devoured by one, and the adventure types who wish to slay one. I'll admit that I enjoy the ravishing and the devouring, as that sort of satisfies a primal desire of mine, but as for being killed, and potentially having my head turned into a trophy - I made sure that when I got the job that the Adventurer would get only a Chance to slay me, but that doesn't mean a Guarantee - they usually find themselves being ravished or devoured, usually both, and that's in the fine print - 'Failure to slay the dragon may result in adventurer being raped or eaten by said dragon. Check box to confirm that you understand this possibility' - funny enough, they complain about it once I have them pinned to the ground, and show them a copy of the agreement showing that they had checked the box. Of course, that's the chance they take, when they try to hunt a dragon."

"What about those who hire you to, um, ravish them?" you asked.

"There's a safe phrase they have to use, if they change their mind - 'I'm a whore, not a virgin.' That's the phrase they have to use," said Draco. "As for preventing themselves from being devoured, the phrase is, 'I'm a radish, not a pig'. Of course, if they honestly don't remember, which does happen on occasion, especially if they had a close call with another creature that had tried to eat/rape them, it's usually best to wait a while until the whole fight/flight/faint thing has been resolved, and they realize that we aren't going to do anything without their say so."

"Interesting," you said.

"Alright, now, let's get back to the Interview," said Draco. "Do you have any issues with being eaten?"

A while later, Draco was looking through a list of questions, most of which were easy to answer, and related if you were allergic to something or not, or if you had issues with hoses being place down your various orifices, and other such things.

"Alright," Draco said. "Got all that out of the way. Now, to see how you taste. Remove your clothes."

You carefully stripped naked, and you saw that Draco was watching you.

The dragon scoffed at what he saw. "Nothing special. Get out."

"What?" you asked.

"You heard me - get out," said Draco. "Just leave - I'll send your clothes with your friends."

"Jesus," you said, as you turned around. "I'm surprised that people work for you, you overgrown hand-"

Suddenly, you found yourself someplace dark, wet, and something was holding your legs. You tried to get out of whatever was holding you, but there was barely any room to move your arms. Then, whatever it was lifted you up, opened up briefly, causing you to drop in further, only to catch you by your feet. It was then you realized that you were looking down Draco's throat.

You gulped. "Now what?"

Then, Draco's head moved again, and soon, your feet were touching the floor. A moment later, you were facing the door. You turned, and saw a smirk on the dragon's face. "Ambush," he said. "The fact that you didn't know that I was going to do that brings something out. Most of the time, you don't even know who is eating you, especially if we stick you in a Nocturnal Section."

"You could of warned me," you said.

Draco grinned. "That would defeat the purpose. Ambushes are called that because they are unexpected. The only warning you'll get is that you're on the Ambush list, and no one asks you to be their meal, because you're off the Ordering List. Now, let's get on with the actual Taste Testing. Step on that pad."

You looked at what he was pointing at.

"That's a Transforming Transporter," said Draco. "I'm sure you can figure out what it does."

"I have to ask," you said.

"I'll have it shrink you, transport you to my desk, and turn you into what I want to eat," Draco said. "We'll start simple, and work up from there."

"Alright," you said.

You stepped on the pad, and the next thing you knew, you were on the desk, no taller than a teacup, and Draco, he seemed to be the size of Godzilla now, and looked like the monster as well, to a degree.

The dragon chuckled, as he looked at you, picking you up in his claws. "I always did like this part." He then tossed you into his mouth, and things soon became interesting.

An hour, and fifty snacks later, you had, once again, reformed in Draco's office, the dragon having finished off a cupcake with you in it. "Rather interesting," he said. "Overall, you do well with most of the food items. Most do well with a handful, and not so well with the rest."

"So, what are you saying?" you asked.

"If you come in tomorrow, you've got a job," said Draco. "If you don't, you've got plenty of money to play with, and perhaps you'll find something else to do. In any case, I'll keep you in mind if you want a job."

"Alright," you said, as you put your clothes on. "Thank you."

You left the office, and located Zaffier and Howard, who paid their bills, and began walking towards the Main Building.

Eventually, you met up with Lissara, who checked your account.

"I guess he liked you," the lizard girl said. "You've got half a million dollars in here." She showed it to you.

"I guess he did," you said.

"Alright," she said. "Time to bring your friends."
1111111111112122222122122111112212133133.title: The Interview

choices: Later that night, there's an Apartment Party, and you're invited.
