The button above the trigger is pressed. On the tank, part of it slides open, revealing a second hose. The second hose then stretches and makes its way to the puddle and sucks it up.

Elizabeth eventually takes the strange device and puts it back into the bag, ".....well.....thats 1.....".
11111211111111111.title: Spray

1111122.content: What could it possibly be?
1111122.title: Something else.

choices: Some other male name with descriptions added.
11112.content:
Who I love still, every day we where together. I could feel myself wanting to cry. She would have loved it here, she was the massive kinky girl.

"I wish she could be here." I say to no one in mind.

"Love still on your world?" Some one asked. I turn around to see a humanoid looking pink furry chicken.

"My girlfriend." I answered.

"It cost around five thousand credits to transport some one to here. And there are few hoops to jump thru after, but if you love them and it truly love back they Won't be angry on how you made that money to get them here." The chicken said as it look off in to the distance. "I'm almost there Maria."

"Thank you." I now had hope to get my angel of love here.

I ran off to look for work in the building.
I see the secretary that was typing away.

"Hello I'm looking for some work. Is there any way to earn some money quickly here?" I asked hoping.

"Of course, we have several open contracts and jobs that pay well and are steady work." She look me over and locked her lips. "What your name sweetie so I can register you for you to start taking on work?"
11112.title: Girlfriend.

choices: Take it and look thru it.
I give it to the security to hold for jeack hallow.
111121.content:
"Kage Ookami." I said to her as she type on the screen.

"Ok, it will take a few day to have you fully registered in to the system love. But you can take on level zero jobs until then and earn some credits for equipment you'll need. In fact here." She held up a stack of papers for me to take. "Pass them out around here and take one, it the weakly bounty sheet noticed for the safari area. It a pain to do myself so I pawn if off on the preregistrations to do for me." She giggled as she went back to work. I huffed and started to go around handing them off. Sure it sucked being a paper boy. But every time I think of my angel I smiled.

"I'm so going to make her pay for not being here." I said as I handed my last one out. I look at my bracelet and tried to think of just what went in to this thing.

"Hay you?" I look up to see a what could only be called a mass of tumor on legs. "Ya you, look I had a run in with a nasty creature out there and don't have time to go get treatment can ya just kill me." It said with out even flinching.

"Could you say that agin?" I asked.

"Put a bullet in my skull. Make me take a dirt nap. What are ya new?" It asked.

"Yes." I replied.

"Aaagghhhh, well welcome then. Look death not a problem here your just given a new body and you just start over with what you got. Look it not really illegal here to kill just frown on badly. I'll sweetened the pot you can take my equipment off me. It old but still good." It handed me a large revolver. "Name is Jeack hollow." It press it to what was it head and waited. I huff and pulled the trigger. After I keep from puking my guys up and it was cleaned I look at the stuff he left behind.
111121.title: Kage Ookami

11113.content:
Ashley, the cutest girl around. She is a lezbien but so am i! I'm Suzy, unlike Ashley i'm not popular or even acknowledged! But i don't care, i have her and that's all that matters.

A poster on the wall that i noticed earlier today read 'Want your loved one? Get them here for just £5000!!!' better start saving... it's a LOT of money. Well, this is the place to be! The safari.

Inside the safari building was a desk with a rusty metal platform that moved people to the outside wall. It was a huge room, with a white and blue emblem that covered the whole floor. It was 2 swords going into a slime. I decided to get started and strided towards a board girl with a hand smooshing her cheek and her elbow resting on the table, she was reading a magazine.

When i got close she talked, without looking up.

"Pleasure or business? Pleasure is fun, business isn't but you get payed..." She turned the page and sighed.

"Oh... well i guess it's been a long day... but i need to get money for my friend, so business" She slides a knife and a strange vacuum cleaner,

"The trapper is basic, your probably new here since you sound so noobish... the 'vacuum cleaner' is actualy a trapper, suck's up monsters, only has 5 slots for monsters. Will you want a mode of transport? Ony £100 for the week" still sounding dull and looking at her magazine.

"Too much... no thanks." I say, shocked by the price.

"Great... go join a group or go alone" still not looking, she shoes me away with one hand! Cheeky!
11113.title: "Girlfriend".

choices: Casey talks about which animal he'd like to be if he's prey.
Suzy and Ashley looked around for the guide.
"You booked this... didn't you read anything." Suzy snapped.
Looking backwards, the pair saw the closed doors behind them.
111132.content:
Suzy and Ashley gave each other a warm hug. They were the shortest in the Safari building by quite a margin, unable to see far through the milling crowd, but a disparate group of twenty formed organically. Choosing to share the savannah experience, the girls realised that many perhaps the whole rest of their party was there to hunt, and they were there for the experience to make some fond memories together...

One of the company guides, herded the party through a large double door. As they all passed through, they each took a ball from the opaque jar planted in the middle of the doorway. An excited buzz ran through the group at this point. While Suzy and Ashley exchanged a slightly confused look. With a shrug the pair opened up their fists revealing the colour of the balls in their hands.

Suzy showed a plain, glossy black ball, and Ashley a snowy white one.

"Are we in different groups?" Ashley whispered. A look of concern about being separated clear on her face.

A snort came from a nearby man, who'd overheard the question.

"Yeah... You could say that." he answered rather more loudly than either girl liked. His tone changed, softened a moment later, "You.. really don't know."

"Which group are you in?" Suzy asked.

"I don't know. That's part of the thrill for me." he answered. "Oh, Jackson... I'm Casey Jackson." he offered her his free hand.

"How can you not know." Suzy thrust her white ball in front of him.

"Yes..." he answered, his head moving oddly as if weighing up what to say... or how to break some upsetting news.

The conversation continued, as the whole group kept on walking. "Well, to that extent I'm with you... madam..." he tilted his head towards Suzy, as he revealed the black ball in his hand.

"But we'll all find out when we step through that portal." There was an excitement to his voice.

Mastering that, he finally spoke clearly.

"Well once through we'll find out who's hunter and who's prey."

Suzy and Ashley shared aghast expressions.

"You are on different sides... so one will be hunter and the other hunted."
111132.title: Suzy and Ashley find a group.

1112.content:
You get to the street that has all the various Safari related buildings. You look at the pamphlet and this is what it tells you:

The first one and biggest is the "entrance" building, where you go out to explore the planet, come back, and also is the best place to negotiate for doing people favors and such.

Then there's the therapy building, where it mentally and/or physically prepares you for the Safari, or helps you recover when you return.
1112.title: Something happens on the way.

choices: Head straight out into the Safari and explore
11121.content: You go in, and see all sorts of different species and people running all about. What to do first?
11121.title: Go to the entrance building

choices: "I have a little errand that needs to be done!"
"I'm about to embark on a tour through the planet, would you like to join us?"
111212.content:
You decide to just approach a random person. So you walk up to some alien who looks very much like a human, only she is considerably shorter than you, has pale-blue skin, and very long, very dark hair that went almost all the way down to her knees.

"Hello." You say. "I'm new here, and I was wondering if you needed something."

"Hayayah?" The alien said, judging by her voice, you guessed this alien was a somewhat young adult. "Ohoho, my name is Glenda. gl'lad I am to see someone so nice as to just come up to me and offer their service'ces. As a matter-of-fact; there is something I think you'd like to hear!"

"Really? Thanks. So what is it?"
111212.title: Talk to people

1112121.content:
"I have an errand that needs to be done." Said Glenda. "My speci'cies is called Redr'dr. We are native on this pla'lanet, and we have a new settlement about two-thousand miles North-north-east of this city. I moved here just two mon'onths ago, then just yesterday realized I had forgotten to bring something vital with me."

"Wow! That far away and you forgot something?" You said. "What was it you forgot, if I may ask?"

"It was my Birthday dress. It do'doesn't seem important to you I'm sure, but it is very important in Redr'dr culture. It is rather sill'illy I'd say, but we do take birthdays very seriously."

"I totally understand. So your birthday's coming up and you need your special dress for it?"

"Exactly. They're very special and val'aluable, they're only made in Redr'dr cities and only one is made for each lady. If you go to the settlement, get my dress then bring it back here to me safely, I'll give you fifty-thousand dollars. How does that sound?"

"Wow! That much? Sounds like a pretty great deal. Although that's quite a long ways away."

"Yes it is. This planet is actually about ten times larger than Earth, to put it in perspective for you. And there are some very efficient ways to travel, but that will be up to you. So, what do you say?"
1112121.title: "I have a little errand that needs to be do...

11121211.content: Within the next few hours, you were heading out the Safari building, ready to take your long trip to the Red'dr city. You stepped out and got onto the...
11121211.title: "I'll do it!"

111212111.content: Are you a boy, or a girl?
111212111.title: Bus

1121.content: Evelyn, a girl with long black hair, black eyes, and a great body. She regularly works out and is on the volleyball team at her school.
1121.title: Evelyn.

11211.content:
After about an hour of just staying in her room, she decides on going to this Safari place.

Just outside of the building, she notices something else, a smaller building with a sword and shield above it's door is next door. Entering this place, she sees a tall muscular man behind counter.

"I can tell that this is your first time here", he begins. "This place sells weapons for people who go on safaris, in other words, a weapon shop. You probably don't have much money, yet, but I can offer you this", he reveals a sword. "This is a pretty basic sword, but it works. 50 bucks, that's the lowest I can go".

She thinks for a second, "I do want to try out this "safari", it sounds pretty interesting. And I should probably get something so I can protect myself". "Alright, I'll take it". 50 REMOVED FROM ACCOUNT. 50 DOLLARS ARE NOW LEFT. Evelyn leaves the store, her new sword attached to her hip and in it's sheath.

Both the inside and outside of the Safari buliding is decorated with statues of monsters and of people fighting them. Evelyn goes up to one of the desks and a lizard girl by the name of Ularra starts to talk to her.

"Welcome to your first time here, Evelyn was it?. The purpose of this place is for one way to go beyond the wall that protects us. People who leave the protection of the wall mainly go to fight monsters. Other popular things are exploration and just to go to, well, have "fun" with the various life forms that exist on this planet. Judging from that sword, you came here to fight, is that what you came here for"?
11211.title: Small store and Safari building.

112111.content:
"Alright", she says, typing something on a nearby computer. She then directs you to another booth that a large muscular lizard man is at. This one introduces himself as Zaffier.

"I have a few questions to ask you before you can leave".

After his questions.

"You want to explore, then I think I know just what to give you". He hands her a small one handed trapper with only 2 domes on it. "That has less holding domes than the trapper we usually hand out, but it is far stronger, allowing you to capture stronger and larger monsters".

And with her trapper at her side, she waits and boards the tram, waiting to leave the city and head past the wall.

The tram finally exits the building, she sees the city for the first time. A section of the wall opens as the tram approaches. It takes her to a small station just past the wall and she exits.

Taking her first step off of the concrete and onto the ground, she exits the station and heads onto the open field.
112111.title: Evelyn past the wall.

1121111.content:
It doesn't take long until she comes across her first monster encounter.

A few slimes were clustered near one of the few trees in sight.

She starts to get excited as she takes a few steps towards them.
1121111.title: It has to be slimes.

11211111.content:
They lunge at her,and with a few short movements and swings of her sword, they are easily dispatched.

Having easily beaten these monsters, she cleans their goo from her sword and puts it back in it's sheath. "That was too easy", saying to herself. Glancing at the forest, "maybe I'll go somewhere a little tougher".

Back on Earth, she loved jogging and hiking in the hills near her house, that was why she decided to go beyond the walls. She wanted to explore, maybe even discover something that no one else has, she was told that most of this planet was unexplored.

So she heads into the forest.
11211111.title: Explorer.

112111111.content:
It's dense, but she is still able to make her way deeper into the forest.

Evelyn has now been traveling for quite a while, having passed all kinds of odd looking creatures and plants, but nothing has attacked her, yet.

An hour has passed since she had entered the forest.

Her right foot suddenly hits something, causing her to stumble forwards a bit. Looking back to see what almost tripped her and gets a surprise. A large purple gem was partially embedded into the ground. She squats down by it and starts to examine it. "Whoa, I wonder how much something like this is worth. Ok, I want it".

She grabs it and pulls, but it doesn't budge. Trying something else, she digs out an area around it and tries again, it shakes. With it now moving, she braces herself and pulls with all of her might.

It suddenly comes loose and shoots above her head. This causes her to immediately get to her feet and forces her to take a few steps backwards. It was heavier than it looked and with it behind her, she looses her balance, and falls backwards.

After doing a backwards roll, she ends up on her stomach with her ass in the air, staring at the freed gem.

What happens next?
112111111.title: How much can I get for it....

1121111111.content:
Something suddenly hits her raised ass with a large audible plop. Letting out a loud gasp, she is surprised to see that it was a large pink slime that had landed on her.

It dwarfed the slimes that were in the field by the station. They were around the size of basket balls, but this one was huge, it was easily 2 feet in length. She tried to move, but couldn't, the slime had covered a huge portion of her body when it landed on her, preventing her from moving.

With the position she was in when, most of her body was engulfed by the monster. It started to pull the rest of her into it. She desperately clawed at the ground, trying to stop it from completely engulfing her.

Evelyn is easily taken inside the clear pink creature and forced into a balled up position. She then remembers her sword, managing to get one of her hands to her side, she realizes the sword isn't there! She does see the sword though, it was by the gem, as was the trapper. They must have detached themselves when she fell.

Not giving up, she was struggling the entire time, but it was no use, the inside was too tough to force her way out. "Great, I didn't even get a chance to fight it. So what now? Is it going to eat me?". And as if on cue, she sees her clothing starting to disintegrate. It makes short work of her clothing, leaving her naked and floating in the monster.

She expected herself to start melting next, but it doesn't. A few minutes pass with her still naked and the pink slime not moving.

It happened so fast. She was just floating there, when she suddenly felt a jolt run through her body. "Ah....what was that?". The sensation immediately comes back, but this time it doesn't fade, on the contrary, it starts to increase. Feeling indescribable pleasure, she doesn't notice herself changing.

Her entire body starts to shrink. It stops, leaving her at 2 feet. With the strong sensation fading, she regains control of herself and realizes what just happened. "Oh my god, what just happened? Why do I look so young?".

"I did it", a voice says out of nowhere. "Huh? Who said that?....Wait, it couldn't be.....the monster, it's talking!? What the hell is going on!?".
1121111111.title: Trapped and changes.

11211111111.content:
"Yes, its me, the "monster". I am the one that changed your body".

"Why? What is the point of this? Is it easier to eat me like this?".

"Actually no, I have no intention of "eating" you. I actually need your help".

"But why did you make me younger?".

"I didn't make you younger. I simply made you smaller and you just happen to look more child like, but your still however old you are and your body functions just like it should. Now I'll explain, I am nothing like those OTHER slimes that I'm sure you've come across. They are slow, stupid, and act solely on instinct. I am nothing like them, the only problem is that I can't speak. You can only hear me now because of the transformation. That is only part of why I made you like that".

"What I have done is a kind of bond, or fusion. We are now linked together. This will benefit the both of us, but enough of that. I need you for 3 reasons, the first is so that you can translate for me. The 2nd is for protection, we are going to protect each other out here. And the last thing is the most important. I am planning on well, starting a slime city".

"Slime city?".

"Yes, I am going to make a city where intelligent slimes like myself can live safely, without having to worry about the people in your city and the lifeforms that exist out here in the wild".

"Wait, but I though you were unique. How are you going to do this, and how is it that your smart? I thought that all slimes were stupid".

"To be honest, I don't know. All I know is that I came from a normal slime, but unlike my "parent" I was a different color and able to think and feel".

"As for how I am going to gather slimes like myself, I am going to make them. Slimes reproduce 3 ways. The main way is splitting after we've grown enough, I am obviously large enough, but I don't want to make a copy of myself. The 2nd way is to combine the DNA of 2 separate slimes, but I don't want anything to do with those morons. The 3rd and final way is to find a host and inject part of ourselves inside it. We actually combine the DNA of the host and slime that way, just like an actual couple, but it's a slime that always comes out and it's still stupid, but I am sure that it's different for me". Evelyn starts to worry as she realizes where this is going. "Yes, I will be using you as my "mate", my queen".

"No, you can't force to do this!", she suddenly yells.

"I am sorry, but it can't be helped, and since I already transformed you, I have no intention of stopping. And don't think of leaving, since we are now linked together, we can't be too far apart, our link won't allow it, our bodies will freeze up and automatically head for each other. But I won't hold onto you forever, once I get it started, I will let you go, if that's what you want".

"Just answer this, why do you want to make this city?".

"Well, I know this sounds lame, but I am sick of being the only smart one of my kind. I have been alive for a few years now, but with no one able to understand me and having only "monsters" for company, I grew sick of it. I started to train myself, making me far stronger than any other slime. I was even able to learn some magic, as you already know. This was all for this day, when I found a girl that I thought was strong, smart, and beautiful enough to be my mate, my queen".

Evelyn cant help but blush a little. "F-fine, I'll help you, but I can't promise I'll stay with you when you let me go".

"Fair enough".
11211111111.title: Queen of the slimes?!

choices: I dont know whatever you want.
112111111111.content:
"He" lets her out.

Surprised that there was no slime on her, she gets to her feet and looks over her new chibi body. "The reason none of my slime is on you is because of our bond, you can freely touch me and pass through me without my slime sticking to you".

Finishing up her examination, she starts to think. "Sigh, this had to happen to me on my first day. Whatever, I did agree to help. At least I did find something that no one knew about".

Her gaze then comes across the gem that caused this whole affair. She goes over to it and bends over. "What are you doing?", the slime asks. "Huh? Oh, well, for all the trouble I went through for this thing, I am so not leaving it".

Picking it up, she expected it to be heavy, but it wasn't it was a lot lighter. Completely surprised, the pink slime begins another explanation.

"It's our link again, we combine our abilities, you are stronger than you use to be". Holding it with one hand, she picks up her sword with the other and faces her "mate". "What now?"."Were going to the city. To be more precise, the place I picked for the city".

They start "walking" next to each other towards the future site of the city of slimes, leaving the trapper behind.

He suddenly stops, "what's wrong?", Evelyn asks.

"Well, I don't think it's suppose to be like this". "Like what?", she asks". "Us, I don't think we should be traveling side by side. Your able to touch me without being sucked into me, unless you want to. Your suppose to be on top of me, like a knight or something".

"But what about you? You will be doing all the walking and have to carry me and everything I have".

"Don't worry. Since I am a slime and because of my training, I can carry a lot. And besides, us slimes don't tire easily, and I will have a great view".

She hesitates for a second, knowing what he meant, but she finally agrees. She places a hand on him and it doesn't go through. She climbs up him and sits in the middle of the slime. She bounces a bit, "a lot nicer up here than I expected". "Of course, again, it's our link. And if you want, you can keep your gem in me, I won't absorb it. But you should probably hold onto the sword". Evelyn releases the gem and it sinks about halfway into him and holds it's position. She then lays the sheathed sword across her lap. "Ready? Then we're off", and the slime heads off with Evelyn sitting on top of him.

They eventually arrive at a large clearing with a very big rock in the middle with a small river passing the front of it. "Here we are. The inside of that rock is hollow, it's perfect for protecting us from the people and larger creatures. There is a small opening by the water's side of that rock. But there is a small problem, about a dozen rats make it home. We will have to clear them out, but it shouldn't be a problem for us".
112111111111.title: Slime riding.

1121111111111.content:
"That's right, I don't even know your name, I'm Evelyn". "Evelyn, huh? It suits you. As for me, I don't have one, I just haven't picked a name for myself".

"No name? How about I give you one? Let' see........I got it, how about Abel? I think its perfect for you".

"......Abel...... I like it, call me Abel from now on. Alright Evelyn, now to acquire our new home". "Yes, Able, lets do this".

"How are we going to do this? We just going to charge in?". "Yes, like I said, they are just rats, big rats, but still rats".

They approach the entrance to the cave and are greeted by snarling rats.

Evelyn unsheaths her now large sword and the 2 rats at the entrance attack.

The first rat is divided in half as it is quickly met by her sword. Able quickly moves the 2 of them to the right, avoiding the 2nd rats attack. The second this one hits the ground, a loud crack echoes through the area as Evelyn hits it's head with the sheath that is in her other hand.

"That was easy", Evelyn says, smiling. "There should only be 10 left, hopefully it will all go like that".

The slime then takes the 2 dead rats into himself. "What are you doing?", Evelyn asks. "We have to clean this up anyway, I though that I would get it out of the way, and besides, I haven't had anything to eat in a while". She watches the 2 rats dissolve into Able directly below her, as she remembers that she too hasn't had anything to eat in a while. She gets a sudden surprise as she feels something enter her from behind. Whatever it was, it spread all throughout her body. "What was that?".

"Huh? Oh, blame our bond again. When were connected like this, we share the nutrients we get when one of us eats something". "That's kind of disgusting". "Yeah, but it does have it's uses, there are things that only I can eat and only things you can, this makes it easier for the both of us to keep up our strength".

Now fully recharged, Evelyn asks, "how are we going to get inside? That is a very small entrance, I don't think I can fit". The entrance was only about a foot in height and 2 feet in length, only something like slimes and rats could get inside. "That is a good question, but I already know how. Remember when I said we share some of our abilities?", Evelyn nods. "Well, just sit there and don't move and you'll see another how we get inside".

Abel pushes himself against the entrance and starts to squeeze himself through. And to her surprise, Evelyn goes with him, her body flattening and lengthening as she follows.

On the inside, they both reform back to their original shapes.

"Ok, that was weird, I guess that happened because I'm on top of you and of our link. Whatever, lets just finish this up".

They travel along an open passageway, dealing with another 5 rats along the way. They eventually arrive at a large chamber at the end of the tunnel. "It's really dark in here, and there is no light. Am I able to see because you can?". "Yes, us slimes are able to see in the dark, and as long as your on me, you can too".

"I see what you mean then, I don't think anyone in the city knows about this place, it's perfect for a hidden city". And it was, it was very large and it a spherical shape that went below ground level. The final 5 rats notice them and charge them.

They are easily dealt with, one after another, leaving only one left.

"Where is it", Evelyn says, looking all around. "Behind you!", Abel yells. She turns around and it is just about to hit her. It was too close, she had no time to react, she closes her eyes and cringes a bit, waiting for it to strike, but it doesn't, she opens her eyes and sees Abel had raised part of himself straight up like some kind of shield. The rat was stuck in him, thrashing and screeching. She raises her sword and runs it thought the monster, ending the short territorial battle over this cave.

"Well, that's the last one", Evelyn says, sticking her sword in Abel and then sheathing it after he cleans it off. "We now have the cave where your going to make your city. But it's in bad shape, I guess rats are just as disgusting here as on Earth".

"Your right, rats are disgusting, and they left this place in such bad shape. But I can clean it up, I am a slime after all, and we are able to digest just about anything. I will just go over every inch of this place and pick everything that shouldn't be here up and absorb it".

Evelyn gets off and waits for the next hour as he "cleans" every single spot in the cave.

Heading back to Evelyn, "ok, finished, this cave is now the cleanest that it has ever been. But I do have a favor to ask, could I possibly borrow the gem that you found?".

She had completely forgotten about it. "Uh, yeah, I guess so". Abel then makes his way up the wall and onto the very center of the ceiling. "I though I've seen something like this before. A while ago, I saw another human female talking about something like this while she was holding one in her hands". He uses his slime to burrow a hole through the rock and wedge the gem into it. A bright purple light then comes out of the gem and almost entirely illuminates the cave. "If you put enough magic into one of these, they generate light. Thankfully, I know how to do something like that and I just had a lot to eat".

Going back down the wall, he stops in front of her. "I can't thank you enough, but we still aren't done. I still need your help, and the next part is very important".

She gulps, as she knows what is next.
1121111111111.title: Names and a new home.

11211111111111.content:
"But I want to put a bit of a hold on that until tomorrow. It is getting pretty late and I want to make sure we got them all, so we'll do this in the morning".

She seems to be relieved, "but what am I going to do? I am still naked and won't it get colder in here? It already seems to be pretty cold".

"I could already tell your cold, but you don't have to worry about that. Get back on me".

She gets back on him and he starts to change his shape. He partially widens himself and makes himself longer. Evelyn finds herself laying back against him. "You are suppose to use me like a bed". And he puts a light cover of himself over her, like a bed sheet.

"I-I guess that's fine. This does feel pretty good", she says, her eyes feeling like there getting heavier by the second. She drifts off to sleep a few minutes later.

She wakes up the next day.

Finding herself on the floor of the cave, she doesn't see Abel. A few minutes later and he finally reappears. "I see your up, I was just getting "breakfast". He slides himself under her and she feels a familiar feeling enter her. "Ah! What are you doing? Did you just do that nutrient thing again? God, I'll never get use to that".

"Now that we're both full, I think it's time we get started". Still under her, he lifts her up while returning to his usual shape. He covers her legs and slightly spreads them. "Now? So suddenly? I can't believe this is happening".

"Just relax, everything will be fine. I can guarantee you this will be amazing, and you don't have to worry about any pain, our bond will make sure of that".

"Nice to meet you David," she greeted, "I'm Julia and now we can begin the tour!" With that said, the two of you begin to make your way down one of the many corridors. As you travel onward, you notice that there are others walking around in various states of inflation; some only had one part of their body swollen up, while others where either bouncing, floating, rolling, and even sloshing around like water balloons. You couldn't help but be amazed by the very thought that all of this was real, and you were going to be apart of it!

Julia spoke, breaking you out of your thoughts, "I'm going to assume that you've already read the pamphlet on the way here right?" You nodded and she seemed to sigh with relief.

"Good," she said," so I can just skip the basics and get right to the interesting parts. As you've already noticed, we cater to any kind of inflation you desire, from full body inflation to smaller ones focusing on a single body part and just about everything in between. If you have any questions, feel free to ask."

You did have a few questions you wanted to get off your chest, better now then ever.

"When you say, 'any kind of inflation' does that also include stuff from things like anime, cartoons, and video games?", you ask. You did have a few favorites that you always dreamed about experiencing first hand.

"Well this wouldn't be much of an Inflation Building if we didn't include personal favorites. Look don't worry if some of them kinda childish. You'd be surprised by how many people want to experience some of their childhood moments from way back when." she giggled.

Well that was one question out of the way. Now it was time for the big one... Even though this whole place was dream come true, a very well known danger was always nagging at the back of your mind.

"Is there any danger of bursting?"

Seeing the concerned look on your face, Julia placed a reassuring hand on your shoulder. The sincere smile on her face told you that everything would be ok in the end as she replied, "I understand what you mean. Don't worry when I say that everything here is completely safe and would never put you in any harm. In the event that you do go 'BOOM' you'll either be deflated back to normal or become a bunch of little pieces that will quickly reform together. In fact a lot of people actually choose to experience what it's like to burst."

Hearing that put you at ease. It really did seem like these people had everything under control so what was there to worry about? With all of the important stuff out of the way, you tell Julia that you are ready to join in on the fun.

"Glad to hear it!" she said with enthusiasm. "Now before we continue I do need to ask you a very important question; do you want to do this all by yourself or with me by your side? I ask since some people get a little nervous when either doing these things for the first time by themselves or with others watching."

You think for a moment and decide that you want to do this...
1411321.title: Yes

14113212.content:
"...I would like to do it with you, just to be safe." You finally answer, with an admitted twinge of hesitation.

"Not a problem!" Julia replied with a smile. "I know wholeheartedly that some people will need help with their first time, and I've been with a lot of people at that point. And it seems we're just about where we need to be..."

Just as Julia finished speaking, you find yourself in front of a large door. It was a vast, circular thing not unlike a vault door, with a small keypad just beside it. Just above it, high above the two of you, a large sign reading "BEGINNER'S STATION" was built into the wall.

"As you can tell be the sign, this station is specifically designed for those like yourself, who are just starting out..." Julia explained as she approached the keypad, rapidly typing a code that you couldn't make out. "Here, we will get you used to the more base-line types of expansion, so that you'll be better prepared for the more specialized types later on."

Soon, her fingers finished their flurry, and the door began to swing open at a slow but steady pace. You had to step back a little to make way, but you soon saw the hall way that the hatch had guarded. It was a surprisingly plush-looking hallway, with a bright-pink carpet and off-white walls.

"Let's begin, shall we?" Julia inquired, regaining your attention.

"U-uh yeah, lets!" You reply, just failing to keep it smooth.

As you and Julia proceed your way in, you get a much better idea of what this "station" is like. To your right, you could see an entire row of observatory decks, each of which seemed to be looking down upon a room just below it. Each deck was manned by at least a dozen staff, most of which were operating computers, statistics and many other gadgets you couldn't quite grasp.

You could see an electronic sign placed just in front of these decks, with a red "OCCUPIED" glowing within the confines of their screens. You and Julia passed at least five of these occupied decks before you finally reaching one that read "VACANT" in green, and Julia motioned you further into the room itself. The deck staff were quick to acknowledge your existence, sending all manner of nods and smiles your way. You eventually were lead to a specially marked square on the floor, on which you and Julia were quick to stand on. This square was in fact an elevator, and you found yourself being slowly lowered into those mystery rooms all of the other decks were looking upon.

And as soon as you reached the floor, you couldn't help but gasp. This room was massive, at least thirty feet in every direction. The room was covered in white padding all over, while four lights beamed down from the ceiling. Various ports could be seen embedded in the walls, seemingly hiding various things you're not privy to. And, just to reiterate, the place was huge.

"This..." You stumble a little, still taking in the scene. "This place is huge!!"

"Well, it has to be," Julia chuckled, moving to your side. "since we blow people up like balloons in here and all. We construct these spaces to be nice and roomy, in case people want to become extra big, or want to inflate with someone else. Speaking of which..." She then walked to face you directly, with an open pose to keep you at ease. "Would you like for only one of us to inflate, or for us to both inflate at the same time?"

Your brow furrowed at this question. since it was the toughest you've had so far. You hm'd and ha'd for a hot second, but you finally decided on...

"Absolutely," Julia cheered, her smile widening to a subtle but noticeable degree. "I haven't really been able to inflate with others in a while, and I'll be able to help you learn the ropes more directly!" She then turned to the staff up above, giving a series of quick hand gestures that you didn't quite understand. You saw a tiny thumbs up appear in the glass, and the hum on machinery was suddenly brewing within the walls. You soon saw all of the ports open up, revealing large tanks that slid outward to reveal themselves. They were many and number, and had many hoses emerging from their front ends. They were all color-coded, every set of tanks having a unique color to them. To distinguish them even further, the all had signs just above them describing their contents.

"Alright!" Julia cheered as the tanks finished their emergence, now sticking out a good two feet from their ports. "While this station has limited options to make sure you're no overwhelmed, we do have quite a few options. Just pick one of your choosing, and I'll follow suit!"

Before you knew it, the air tanks around you were on the move; mechanical hoses began to slink out from their fronts, and soon were slithering towards the both of you.

Unease slowly gnaws away at you as the segmented tendrils zeroed in, but Julia remained unperturbed, simply opening her hand for one of them to slip into. "Now, self-inflation is a very simple operation, and it all boils down to this remote!" Julia clicked a small lanyard at the remote's base to her wrist. "The top button inflates, the bottom button deflates! The bottom side button will deflate you completely, and the top-side..." Her smile became ever so slightly more coy as she paused. "...we'll just ignore it for now."

Before you can elaborate, the top nozzle on Julia's remote began to pop up of its own accord. It danced and cavorted on its own cable-hose, before looking directly into her eyes.

"Getting uneasy? Don't worry; it's the same song for most newbies here." Julia reassured you, her expression suddenly seeming somewhat smug. "How about we finally blow up together and finally take the pressure off?"

You see another control hose slink right next to you, standing right next to your arm's reach. The nozzle gleams in the room lights. The wheels turn in your head once more.

After some pondering, you say...

1511121122111111111111111111211.title: Game ends.

15111211221111111111111111112111.content:
(I'm changing Catty's name to Cassie. Heck of a load quicker for me to type, plus it sounds more natural. Dunno why, just...does, OK?)

Alice was about to take herself and her new attire out of the room, but she was stopped by Eliza and Kyle holding up her arms. "Whoa, hang on," said Eliza, looking a little confused. "Where're you heading off to?"

"Back to my room," Alice replied.

"So you're abandoning us?" Cassie said, sounding hurt.

"From what?" Alice truly was confused at this point.

"We're your mates, right?" Kyle said with a smile. This smile made Alice feel both warm inside, plus a slight embarrassment.

"You...you really think of me as a friend?"

Eliza chuckled. "Of course, silly! You were a good sport, you got along with the three of us. And you were decent girl, which is something more than the other idiots around here."

Alice smiled warmly. "Well, we're still here," she said, as the four went back outside into the game hallway. "You wanna do another game?" The faces that the other three made gave Alice her answer. "Then which one?"

"You feel like you want a little scare?" Kyle asked, glancing at Cassie's wide eyes.

"No! Please say we don't have to do that one again!"

"What one's that?" Alice asked.

"The most frigging terrifying game you'll ever play," Eliza said in a cheesy spooky tone, something that made Cassie shiver.

"No, I'm not doing this one again. Thank god that only three people is needed. I'm sorry Alice," she said timidly, sounding truly apologetic.

"For what?"

"Nightmares...for the rest of your life..." The way Cassie said it though sent a cold shiver down Alice's spine.

But that wouldn't scare her off.

"C'mon, bring it on," Alice said, punching her left hand with her right. "Nothing's going to give ME nightmares!"

Eliza and Kyle glanced at each other, both knowing that this was the one thing that wouldn't happen.

"Trust me Alice," Kyle said, looking directly into her eyes. "This is one thing you don't want to piss about with. I'll give you advice, but it'll be explained later anyway. Don't trust anyone. Not a soul. The single detail that misses you could seriously cost you your life. That's my second piece of advice: pay attention. Check for detail, and note it straight away. You might forget it. So, Don't. Trust. Anyone. And pay attention."

"The first time we played this game," Eliza said to Alice, who was starting to seriously get creeped the fuck out, "Kyle and I had nightmares about it for a week. I wouldn't leave my room for two days. To be honest, I think it's going to be the same again this time around."

"Look, there's no point in beating around the bush, let's go!"
15111211221111111111111111112111.title: The Terror

151112112211111111111111111121111.content:
The first port of call that Alice, Kyle and Eliza made was register themselves as players for the game, and made it that each of their games wouldn't interact with the others. This was a solo game, and Alice had to fend for herself in a game she had little knowledge of, except that it could literally make you crap yourself.

Maybe this was something bigger than she could chew...

'Ah well, no turning back now,' she thought as she went into a clothing selection room. She had no idea as to what to wear, but there was something that caught her eye.

It was a black overcoat jacket, paired with black trousers. It looked rather peculiar, so she decided to try it on. The end result was truly shocking.

She looked much older than she was, at least in her early twenties. When she put her hands in her trouser pockets, and stared at the mirror, she was slightly scared of herself by the cold look she was giving off. But she thought that she needed a white shirt under the jacket, and a loosely knotted tie. She didn't know why, she just thought it looked cool.

(For those who want a reference, click here: http://www.videogamesblogger.com/wp-cont...  imagine the guy as a girl basically, with a little bit longer hair, and you got Alice's look.)

But when the selection was complete, and she found her vision returning after a brief black flash, she wasn't where she expected to be: in a school, with school clothes.

Alice looked around her, and felt groggy. "Was all of that a dream?" she said to herself, rubbing her temple. If that planet was in fact a dream, then it was a very realistic dream.

"Alice Dratelli!" the teacher at the front of the class yelled. Alice looked up immediately, but inside her head, she knew that that surname wasn't hers.

'So it's this that's the dream?' she thought. 'But we were about to play the game. Why would I be dreaming? Unless...this IS the game? Ugh, this is too confusing.

A knock came from the classroom door.

"Come in!" called the teacher. The door opened, and revealed a girl that Alice both knew well and also never recognised.

She was tall, with big eyes and a thin body. Her hair was coloured a deep purple, and it flowed down her back like a waterfall.

A purple waterfall, but one nevertheless.

"Hello sir," she said in a proud, but polite voice. "Is Alice around?"

"Dratelli! Go on, move it!"

Alice instinctively packed up her things, and walked outside with the girl. Alice oddly knew the girl's name, which she felt slightly scared about.

"So Dannie, what's going on? Why'd you call me out here?"

"You heard about the recent murders going on?"

"Murders?"

"Yeah, murders," Dannie answered, walking outside towards the student car park. "The team want you down at the most recent crime scene."

"What kind of murders?"

Dannie tossed Alice the keys. "You drive. At least you got a licence already."

"Dannie, what about the murders?" Alice asked, climbing into the driver's seat. For some reason, Alice also knew how to drive off by heart, even though she'd never been inside a commercial vehicle before. She'd only driven spaceships before, and yet here she was turning the engine over as if she'd done it a hundred times before.

"I'll tell you about it on the way down. My surprise."

"You seriously got a strange sense of humour, haven't you Dannie?"

"So I've been told," Dannie replied tonelessly, clicking her seatbelt into place. 

It took Alice and Dannie fifteen minutes to get where they wanted, through which time Dannie explained about the murders.

They've had two cases so far, both identical. Both looked as if they were eaten, in pieces at first, before regurgitating the pieces back up. It was "fucking disgusting", as Alice put it, something that Alice would usually never say even in private. It seems that this Alice had more of a brash attitude than normal.

But she continued to listen, as there was something that made the police more baffled than before. There were teeth marks all over the body pieces, but they weren't human. They weren't even from any animal on the database. It was something unnatural.

"Christ, the hell has been eating these poor guys?"

"Girls," Dannie corrected.

"That just makes it bloody worse, don't it?"

"Wait until you see them, Alice. Try not to barf."

Which was something Alice very nearly did when they arrived.

The girl that laid before them, or at least the parts that this once beautiful girl, was an awful sight to behold. Blood and flesh was splayed out in a matter of ways. The face was barely recognisable, it being so disfigured by what looked like acid burns.

On a side note, the rational side of Alice's brain - which coincidentally was the only terrified part of her brain as well - noticed that her seventies detective outfit was on her body. She hadn't noticed it, but there was a brief glitch in her vision as she got out of the car, so perhaps it happened at that point. 

Alice knew that she had to take in every detail she could. How she knew that though, she couldn't remember. But it felt as if someone from long ago told her that advice.

Her right hand had a wedding ring on her finger, meaning she was at least over eighteen. "Dannie," said Alice, without looking up from the exquisite ring. "Did the other victim have a wedding ring?"

"Lemme check," Dannie replied, ruffling through a few sheets of paper. "Umm, yes, she did. A beauty of a ring, as well."

"Right hand?"

"Yes."

"OK, so we're looking for a killer who probably married young, maybe twenty or something. His wife was likely to be left-handed, also deceased soon after the marriage. Look up women who died soon after a marriage. It could be a psychopath here."

Dannie scoffed. "Could be? I'd say yes, definitely."

Alice smiled at the crude joke, but in her brain, the real Alice was actually starting to become more and more terrified by the moment. Was this actually a simple vore game, or an actual murder?

Alice then took a closer look at the burnt face, and smelt the burning fumes of hydrochloric acid, or the stuff that breaks down food in the stomach. 

"Jesus Christ!" Alice said, coming to a realisation that only a vore veteran would realise. "This girl's head was eaten, and I think inside a stomach long enough for it to start breaking down!"

"Are you fucking serious?!" Dannie said, crouching down next to Alice. It only took one whiff of the acid to prove Alice right. "Shiiiit, the hell is going on, Alice?"

"I dunno Dannie, I really don't know."

[Ooh, now this is starting to get tense! And so begins Alice's Terror Arc. I'll be slowly adding to this storyline, as I got much others to work on as well as this thread, but trust me; by the time Alice finishes this game, she'll never sleep without a gun again!]

So, choices...
1) We follow Alice as she goes towards her home, where she experiences first-hand the terror that the killer produces, by almost being eaten herself. But to keep our vore fetishists happy (I'm not one. I prefer breasts myself to being eaten alive, to be honest), the writer should do something for the vore power to reawaken inside Alice. She gains the power to create any person she wanted (which could then turn into a sex slave/vore slave). The awakening of the power would actually change Alice's personality a bit, which would draw suspicon onto Alice for being the killer. So after all this has happened, she has to avoid the police, since she is their suspect; avoid the killer who's trying to murder Alice; and also clear her name and remove her powers for the game to end. The Terror Arc is going to be a big one, it seems...

2) Your own path could go here, if you want to take Alice somewhere completely different, making it so that her powers awaken a much different way.
151112112211111111111111111121111.title: Is This A Dream, Or Reality?

1511121122111111111111111111211111.content:
(You know what? I'm gonna completely ditch the idea of Alice having vore powers. It's too forced for my liking, and besides, she's trying to find the person who's killing these people, not being part of their world. Alice has...just read the damn thing. You'll pick it up sooner or later.)

After thinking about it for a few moments, Alice came to a shocking and awful conclusion. She run her hand through her hair, and sighed in frustration.

"You think of something?" asked Dannie.

"I know who did this thing," Alice said, lightly touching the burnt person's body with her hand. Her fingertips tingled at the touch. But Dannie guessed from her tone of voice that it was a bad thing that she knew. Dannie crouched down next to her, and leant in for Alice to tell her.

"A voreist did this."

Dannie was confused. She'd never heard of that term before. Alice beckoned Dannie to follow her, as the vore matter was a somewhat delicate thing. They left the crime scene, and walked into a back alleyway.

"A voreist," Alice started, her eyes appearing dark and annoyed, "is a person who can literally eat an entire person whole, without the use of cutting the body into pieces."

"That just sounds like the next level of cannibalism, doesn't it?" Dannie asked. "But wait a sec. Isn't it impossible to eat a person whole? The jaw isn't wide enough to go past the head, let alone a whole body."

Alice stepped close to Dannie, and pressed hard on a certain point just where Dannie's jaw was connected to the muscles surrounding the face of the skull. Her entire bottom jaw hung down wide, at least a foot down. Dannie's entire face just got longer.

Alice pushed upwards sharply on Dannie's jaw, reconnecting the bottom jaw to the face.

"That is what voreists do," Alice said darkly as Dannie stepped back in shock, holding her mouth.

"What the-? What the hell did you do?" she shouted, amazed and scared by Alice's actions.

Meanwhile, the real Alice was starting to piece things together. She stopped time at that moment, which was a power explained to her earlier by Kyle.

She could stop time anytime she wanted, but she could not interact with anyone or anything, unless a person was a player themselves. This other player would be someone from the real world, playing as the main villain of the story. However, to prevent the other from recognising the other player, the other is shrouded in darkness, and their voice is different to that of the real one.

So when Alice stopped time, she saw a person standing nearby, surrounded by black mists. Around herself, Alice saw that she was covered with white mists.

"What a damn cliche, huh," said the other person. "Black for evil, White for good. So, what's your name?"

"What's yours?" Alice countered.

"I asked first."

"...fine," Alice muttered, sounding a little annoyed. Maybe she was rubbing off the game's Alice's personality. "My name's..." She had to think of a good name, not something stupid, but also something that said she was the heroine. "My name's...Keira. Keira Swallow."

"Fair enough," the other person said. "The name's Rock Holloway. I'm your opponent this time, so I won't be stopping time. However, you can stop time as many times as you want, to make sure you're going in the right direction, or if you want a little break."

(The real Alice decided to let herself be called Keira from now on, as it was easier for herself to remember that Alice was the one on the outside, and she was the Keira on the inside.)

Keira smiled, before rubbing her head the same way Alice did earlier. "So, the killer is a vore user then."

"That's correct. This is a vore based game, after all. I should let you know that we can say words in text by saying it in a certain way. So for instance, if I say this is in black, 'The killer is a vore user'," - at this, black text appeared in front of Keira's eyes, the same words that Rock had said - "That means the truth, in every sense. However, you can say facts about the case in white, unless of course, I can destroy your white truth with my black."

"I wonder then," Keira muttered, as she resumed time, and let the case continue it's course.

[If there's any fans out there, they would recognise the Umineko no Naku Koro Ni reference by the black/white truth with Umineko's Red/Blue truth. I love the series, as it's a brilliant mind twister to make you keep guessing. I suggest you watch the anime/read the manga/play the game. Yes, it's covered by all of those three formats.]
1511121122111111111111111111211111.title: The Black & White Truth

15111211221111111111111111112111111.content:
"How do you know about this?" Dannie asked, fear in her voice. "Are you a-?"

Alice burst out laughing. "Haha, fuck off, I ain't a voreist. I only have knowledge of them."

"But how do you know about it?"

"I've seen it happen before, many many times before."

"Eh?" Keira stopped time again, wondering about what Alice said. "Does that mean then, that 'vore has existed in this world since nineteen years ago'?" Those few words were said in white.

[Both Alice and Keira are nineteen years old.]

"That is correct," Rock replied, nodding what appeared his head. "'The whole world's population is able to perform vore, but only fanatics of vore know how to perform it safely.'" Rock said this in black.

"If that's the case," Keira said, who walked over to the frozen crime scene, and crouched down next to the burnt body parts, "I could go on the basis that 'the killer is an inexperienced vore user'."

(Whenever I use apostrophes around text, it will usually mean either Keira or Rock using White/Black truth respectively.)

"'The killer has used vore for over four months, the right of time needed to train a vore user to execute it safely'."

"Shit," Keira muttered, standing back up. "Did then, 'the killer did not have enough time to finish the procedure, and brought up the person in a dangerous way'?"

"Resume time, Swallow," Rock said in a triumphant manner. "You'll have your answer soon enough."

So Keira did.

Alice looked over to the CSI who was observing the body parts. "Do we know a time of death?"

"Not yet D.I. Dratelli, sorry," said the CSI, looking up at the young detective. "But, at a guess, maybe four, five hours ago, at max."

Keira paused time once again. Rock sounded a little amused.

"You like to keep track of the facts, don't you?" he laughed, darkness billowing around him. "That's a good thing, perhaps," he added, whilst folding his arms.

"Answer in black," Keira said angrily. "What is the time for safe vore to be completed?"

"'Vore can be performed, completed, and the vored person can be safely brought back to life in three hours'."

'So,' Keira thought, 'who would kill a person if they knew the way to safely bring them back to life?'

Alice was coming to that answer when Keira resumed time.

"What could be a motive?" asked Dannie.

"Could be anything at the moment," Alice replied with a sigh. "Bad blood, random act of killing them. Was there anything stolen?"

"The victim didn't have a wallet on them, but there was a pricey watch on her wrist, and that ring was still on her finger."

"That rules out a robbery."

'I know that it's only three hours for vore to be done safely,' Alice thought, sticking her hands in her pockets as she pondered over a motive. 'So why do a mistake and kill them? Was it bad blood after all?'

"Do we have any idea on who the girl is?"

"Not a clue," said the CSI as he zipped up the fourth body bag. "But once we get these body parts into the lab, we'll run fingerprints and iris scans on her. The database should get something on her."

"Haha, piss off," said Keira, her eyes watching the frozen CSI. "Like hell it'll be that damn easy."

"Patience, Swallow," Rock answered, laughing.

"Fuck you Holloway."

"Watch your mouth, Swallow. I detest swearing."

"Now I want you to piss off even more."

"Bah, fine, I'll leave."

"Finally," Keira muttered as the black mist and Rock melted into the air. "I thought he'd never damned leave." Keira then put a hand to her mouth, shocked. "When did I start speaking like that?"

"Five seconds ago," said the voice of Rock, "when you told me to, quote, 'Fuck off', end quote."

"Oh yeah," Keira said with an understanding voice but also hinting at some frustration. "Rock, I still want you to do so. I want to think about something."

"Be my guest." Rock's voice disappeared into the air, leaving Keira alone.

"Christ..." Keira sat herself down on one of the nearby benches. "OK, let's think this through.

"The killer is an experienced voreist, who pulled out his victim from the acid in the stomach before the time needed to safely perform vore. There's no damn way that the fingerprints will pull out something from the database. It's likely that the killer had burnt off the fingerprints individually before dumping the body parts, since this is not the real crime scene, merely a dumping point. But why would he kill this girl? A kind of revenge against an old marriage? Most serial killers usually have a psychotic breakdown for the killings to trigger. Think Keira, you idiot!" She slapped herself across the cheek, trying to get something going inside her head. "Why would the guy kill her? What would he-?" Keira stopped short, as something clicked in her. "Wait...what if it wasn't a murder? Vore is a fetish, I know of that. But so is snuff films. Was this girl so frigging sick that she wanted to be killed by a guy voreing her?! Rock, get your butt out here!"

Rock appeared with a bow. "You figure something out?"

"'The killer may have not murdered her, as the victim may have actually wanted to be vored'."

"'The killer knew the victim, but did not perform vore for the victim's pleasure. Therefore he did it for his own."

"However, I claim that 'the victim would not class herself as a murder victim'."

"Heh...hahaha! Damn, you're good!" The black shadows around Rock swirled taller around him. "That is correct, miss Swallow."

"Wait...that means this: 'The victim knew of vore, but she did not know that you could die if not performed properly. The killer took advantage of this, giving himself his own pleasure of killing her, but ended her pleasure sooner than she wanted'."

"'The killer took the girl's life for his own pleasure'," Rock said in black, who walked close to Keira, "'but the girl did know of the danger of badly performed vore'."

"What the hell?!" Keira yelled. She slammed her fist down on the bench, but the wood made no sound. "What kind of sick-minded bitch was this cow? She wanted to die?!"

"'The girl knew her killer well, and of his vore power. She also trusted the killer well enough to perform the vore safely'."

Keira thought on his words for a little, wondering on what he said. "She knew him? And trusted him?"

"That is correct."

"...the killer is her husband."

"Heh....we'll see whether your detections are correct, miss Swallow...."

Oh it works! It's the difficulty of the task that matters alright!
15111211221221111111112.content:
Darting through the forest Alice looks desperately for somewhere dry, but nothing shows up. Her mind darts over her recent memories, trying to dredge up if she's seen anything in the last hour and a half that could work, but nothing comes to mind. However one thing that the game said to her back in her Starting Room does stick in her mind: "THE MAIN WAY TO GET STRONGER IS SIMPLE. EAT EVERYONE AND EVERYTHING"
Wait, could it be that simple? Surely not? EveryTHING? She looks around herself with new eyes.
Drenched through her simple clothes she tips her head back and opens her mouth wide, VERY wide. Water pours into her and down her throat, flooding her stomach. She can feel her belly stretch already and it continues. Her jaws are wide enough and the rain is coming straight down so her body is actually not getting wet now. Soon though she has to stretch her jaws more as her gut balloons out more and more, filling with gallons of water.
After a few minutes the sudden downpour ends as abruptly as it started, the thunder echoing off into the distance as the clouds roll away. Alice relaxes against a tree and clicks her jaws back to normal and feels her stomach working hard and her body fills out... though not very much. It seems water doesn't do much for her, not as much as the rabbit despite having far more mass. Experimentally she grabs bushes, fruit, even a large rock (as big as she can lift) and find that most things around her she can eat, but most don't seem to give her much 'power'. The rain actually seemed more powerful than most things around here. Perhaps because it was some sort of game element? It only happens every now and then so it's more powerful as it's not as available?
"Hmm, if that's the case then the more difficult a thing is to get the power it has... I wonder?"
She walks over to a huge boulder by the foot of a hill nearby and kneels down. There is nothing to get a grip on and trees cover the front and top so she couldn't just open wide and swallow it off the ground... Is that tricky enough? But just a boulder?
For the next few minutes she grabs sticks and digs around the rock, making room for her mouth alongside it. She has to pull and twist some of the tree limbs away from it but eventually it seems enough and she squats down by her next 'meal'.
"OK, here goes."
It's much larger than anything else she's tried, much bigger than she is, but the various bushes and stones she eaten seem to at least given her practice at widening her jaws and she starts to spread her lips around one side. Needless to say it doesn't taste good. Stone and mud do not appetisers make!
Over the next few minutes she presses forwards and eases the huge boulder inside her mouth, squeezing it tightly (VERY tightly!) into her. Finally her lips seal past it and she gulps some more, her body stretching tightly around it till it plops fully into her, now gigantic, stomach. Alice flips over and knocks down several of the trees nearby, now over three times her previous size, looking like she was several years pregnant with quadrouplets!
Again the warmth flows through her as she 'digests' the stone. Was all that worth it? I mean, it's just a rock, right?

Her figure swells, in the right places thankfully, and a simple dress appears on her, then changes, becoming snazzier with little shiny bits. She can feel that she's stronger physically now, as well as quicker. Probably better than she is 'normally'.
OK, so it's how difficult it is to eat something that determines how powerful it makes you. Presumably enemies that fight back (like that primitive rabbit back there) have more power for you simply because they are dangerous... well, it wasn't that dangerous, but it seems to be a working principle. Hmph, this still doesn't solve the puzzle over what the objective of this game is though. Alice gets up, stretching her new sexier body and strides off looking for something a little tastier to wash down the boulder. Say a French waiter or maybe a stewardess. Might as well up her power while she tries to figure out this place, and might as well enjoy her meals while she's upping her power!
That's a thought. Does she want to wolf down just anyone or does she have preferences?
